stim.name: Health Shot
stim.desc: Restores a small amount of HP.

impact.name: High-Impact Grenade
impact.desc: Deals minor damage to all enemies, perfect for crowd control.

focus.name: Focus Shot
focus.desc: Deals massive damage to your enemies, but due to its instability, it will destroy itself upon use, as well as dealing damage to yourself. Due to contingency programming, it will not fire if it will kill you.
